Alarms go off in each of the Drackotrons quarters as Prebons wake up call s=
ounds. Prebons message and a map appear directing them to one of the most h=
ostile places on the planet at the time. (No I don't mean New York and I do=
n't mean a lawers office.)  Mt Fuji, one of the biggest volcanos on the pla=
net. Prebon stepped outside and activated his jetpack so that he could beat=
 the others there.
